name: Hellhound Battle Master Tournament - Rise of the Morpho Ray
name_original: Hellhound Battle Master Tournament - Rise of the Morpho Ray
description:
WELCOME TO THE ARENA OF HELL !!

YOU KNOW WHAT ?? YOU'RE A DEMON, YOUR FRIEND IS A DEMON AND EVERYONE IS A DEMON BECAUSE THIS IS HELL

SO NOW YOU WILL MESS WITH YOUR BUDDIES AND F*CK SHITS UP BECAUSE HELL YEAH YOU CAN §§

OH BUT IS YOUR DUDE TOO STRONK FOR YOU LITTLE PIECE OF PRECIOUS ANGEL ??

WELL NO PROBLEM, JUST SHAPESHIFT THAT B*TCH, EAT A HEART AND GET BACK TO WORK !!

AND IN CASE YOU DIDN'T KNOW, YOUR JOB IS TO KILL !! BECAUSE DEMONS, THAT'S WHAT THEY DO §§§

(also the game is a demon too, so it will mess your match with bugs and shit and mess your computer, no sh*t dude your computer will freak out and think it's a virus, BECAUSE HELL IS HELL)

Controls :
J1 - Move ZQSD, Morph Y, Attack U
J2 - Move Up/Left/Down/Right, Morph 1, Attack 2

Christopher Deschamps - Design & Programming
Charly Bonhomme - Design & Art
